event.descr: This notification is generated when one or more virtual servers are down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcVIPDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Count of VIPs down =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all virtual servers are up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcVIPDownThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers up threshold configuration is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerUpThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers up threshold configuration is satisfied
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerUpThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when connection table current sessions threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcConnectionTableCountThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when connection table current sessions threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcConnectionTableCountThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Control CPU Usage is breached for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcControlCPUStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Control CPU usage threshold is satisfied for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcControlCPUStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC DataCore CPU usage threshold is breached for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoreCPUStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC DataCore CPU usage threshold is satisfied for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoreCPUStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when count of ADC DataCores exceeds threshold count for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoresExceedingThreshod trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold count = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current count = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when count of ADC DataCore satisfies the threshold count for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoresExceedingThreshodCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure per NPU threshold is not satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerNPUThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure per NPU threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerNPUThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure for DP threshold is not satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerDPThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% DP Number =%parm[dpNumber]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure for DP threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerDPThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% DP Number =%parm[dpNumber]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ms interface is down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: msInterfaceStatusDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ms interface is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: msInterfaceStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when Egress interface is down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: egressInterfaceStatusDownThreshold trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when Egress interface is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: egressInterfaceStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB Routing Instance Composite next hop Index is not available.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: tlbRINextHopIndexStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB Routing Instance Composite next hop Index is not available.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: tlbRINextHopIndexStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers down threshold configuration is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers down threshold configuration is satisfied
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerDownThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when configured CPU utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cpuUtilizationStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when configured CPU utilization threshold is satisfied
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cpuUtilizationStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CPU limit, Memory limit and Flow limit packet drops.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: packetDropStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when there is no CPU limit, Memory limit and Flow limit packet drops.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: packetDropStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when memory status is breached
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: memoryZoneStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when memory status is Cleared
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: memoryZoneStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ports utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPoolUtilStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when when ports utilization threshold is satisfied
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPoolUtilStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when current port blocks in use equal to effective port blocks.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPortBlocksInUseStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when current port blocks in use not equal to effective port blocks.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPortBlocksInUseStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when service PIC is down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: servicePICStatusDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% service PIC Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when service PIC is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: servicePICStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% service PIC Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when SDG status is changed.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% status = %parm[sdgStatus]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when SDG status is normal.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% status = %parm[sdgStatus]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing instance BGP advertising AS path is greater than zero
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing instance BGP advertising AS path is zero.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing instance BGP advertising AS path is zero
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing instance BGP advertising AS path is greater than zero.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all MSP/DNS facing IRB interface should be VRRP master if SDG is master or VRRP standby if SDG is standby.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all MSP/DNS facing IRB interface should be VRRP master if SDG is master or VRRP standby if SDG is standby.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync role status is not proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATStatefulSyncRoleStatusThreshold trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync role status is proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATStatefulSyncRoleStatusThresholdCleared trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync connection status is not proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATStatefulSyncConnectionStatusThreshold trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync connection status is proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCNATStatefulSyncConnectionStatusThresholdCleared trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync syncronization status is not proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATStatefulSyncSyncronizationThreshold trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT stateful sync syncronization status is proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCNATStatefulSyncSyncronizationThresholdCleared trap received Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT default route is status is not proper
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT default route status status is proper.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all VIP's are not point to local ADC service pic
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all VIP's are point to local ADC service pic
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB routing instance default Route not point to Composite Next hop index
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgTLBRIDefaultRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB routing instance default Route point to Composite Next hop index
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sdgTLBRIDefaultRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC temperature threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcTemperatureThreshold trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC temperature threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcTemperatureThresholdCleared trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine temperature threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reTemperatureThreshold trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine temperature threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reTemperatureThresholdCleared trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when control board temperature threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: controlBoardTemperatureThreshold trap received CB Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when control board temperature threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: controlBoardTemperatureThresholdCleared trap received CB Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC CPU utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcCpuUtilizationThreshold trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC CPU utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcCpuUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC CPU utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picCpuUtilizationThreshold trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC CPU utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picCpuUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine CPU utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reCpuUtilizationThreshold trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine CPU utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reCpuUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC memory utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcMemoryUtilizationThreshold trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC memory utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcMemoryUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC memory utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picMemoryUtilizationThreshold trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC memory utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picMemoryUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine memory utilization threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reMemoryUtilizationThreshold trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine memory utilization threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reMemoryUtilizationThresholdCleared trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC buffer threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcBufferThreshold trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when FPC buffer threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: fpcBufferThresholdCleared trap received FPC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC buffer threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picBufferThreshold trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when PIC buffer threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: picBufferThresholdCleared trap received PIC Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine buffer threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reBufferThreshold trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when routing engine buffer threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: reBufferThresholdCleared trap received RE Name = %parm[slotName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when high threshold was exceeded.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: highThresholdExceeded trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated high threshold was exceeded but dropped.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: highThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when low threshold was exceeded.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: lowThresholdExceeded trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated low threshold was exceeded but dropped.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: lowThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when status of interface Down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: statusThresholdDown trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when status of interface previously down has been restored.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: statusThresholdUp trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%
